text: Beaufort-en-Anjou is a commune. It is in Pays de la Loire in the Maine-et- Loire department in west France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Beaufort-en-Vallée (the seat) and Gée.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Maine-et-Loire
title: Beaufort-en-Anjou
